description: What's better than an&nbsp;apple? A poison apple, of course! This festive drink will have your friends marveling at its beauty while feeling just a teensy-weensy bit tipsy. The glittering gold liquid is almost too pretty to sip, but don't worry - it isn’t actually poisonous, so you can enjoy this special&nbsp;apple cocktail.
name: Poison Apple
